name: Safe Load Indicator – Tower Crane
tagline: Precision load monitoring for tower cranes
overview: Our Safe Load Indicator (SLI) for Tower Cranes provides real-time load monitoring, radius-based capacity calculation, and overload prevention. Designed for construction and high-rise projects where tower cranes operate at varying radii and heights.

safetyParameters.title: Moment Limit
safetyParameters.description: Prevents structural failure by tracking load x radius.

safetyParameters.title: Radius Safety
safetyParameters.description: Automatic cut-off when reaching safe working limits.

safetyParameters.title: Wind Monitor
safetyParameters.description: Continuous velocity tracking for site stability.

safetyParameters.title: Fault Alert
safetyParameters.description: Immediate diagnostics for all connected sensors.

workingPrinciple: The system measures hook load via load cell or boom strain, boom angle via inclinometer, and boom length where applicable. A microprocessor computes the moment (load × radius) and compares it against the crane’s load chart. Visual and audible alarms trigger when approaching or exceeding safe limits.
keyFeatures: Real-time load, radius, and moment display
Compliance with IS 14475 and similar standards

name: Safe Load Indicator for EOT Cranes
tagline: Real-time load monitoring and safety automation for incident-free operation
overview: The SLI for Electric Overhead Travelling (EOT) cranes ensures safe lifting in workshops, warehouses, and factories. It monitors hook load and provides immediate warning and cutoff to prevent overloading and equipment damage.

safetyParameters.title: Load Limit
safetyParameters.description: Instant hoist cutoff when capacity is exceeded.

safetyParameters.title: Angular Safety
safetyParameters.description: Detection of unsafe hook sway or off-center lifts.

safetyParameters.title: System Check
safetyParameters.description: Internal watchdog for PLC and sensor health.

safetyParameters.title: Limit Switch
safetyParameters.description: Secondary hardware protection for hoist height.

workingPrinciple: A load cell installed in the rope or hook path measures the actual load. The display shows real-time weight and percentage of capacity. At configurable thresholds, warning and overload alarms activate; relays can disable hoist motion when overload is detected.

name: Safe Load Indicator for Gantry Cranes
tagline: Outdoor-ready load monitoring and wind-aware safety for gantry operations
overview: Our SLI for Gantry Cranes covers rail-mounted and rubber-tyred gantry cranes used in ports, yards, and heavy fabrication. It provides overload protection and optional trolley position feedback for rated capacity limiters (RCL).

safetyParameters.title: Wind Safety
safetyParameters.description: Automatic locking during high wind velocity events.

safetyParameters.title: Overload Lock
safetyParameters.description: Prevents hoist operation beyond structural rating.

safetyParameters.title: Sway Monitor
safetyParameters.description: Monitors load stability during gantry travel.

safetyParameters.title: Logic Guard
safetyParameters.description: Failsafe operation if sensor signal is lost.

workingPrinciple: Load is measured via load cell; optional sensors provide trolley position for moment-based capacity where applicable. The system compares actual load (and moment) against the crane’s capacity and triggers alarms and interlocks as configured.
keyFeatures: Robust for outdoor and port environments
Easy integration with existing crane PLCs

name: Safe Load Indicator – Crawler Crane
tagline: Heavy Duty Stability for Lattice Structures
overview: The SLI for Crawler Cranes supports lattice and telescopic boom crawlers used in civil, infrastructure, and heavy lifting. It provides load moment indication (LMI), radius, and boom angle with overload protection.

safetyParameters.title: Moment Guard
safetyParameters.description: Real-time tracking of load vs. lattice extension.

safetyParameters.title: Level Sensor
safetyParameters.description: Monitoring for ground stability and chassis level.

safetyParameters.title: Angle Safety
safetyParameters.description: Verification of boom positioning against chart.

safetyParameters.title: Winch Protection
safetyParameters.description: Immediate lockout on capacity threshold.

workingPrinciple: Load, boom angle, length, and optional slew are measured continuously. The LMI computer uses the crane’s load chart to compute allowable load vs. actual load. Alarms and cutoffs activate when limits are exceeded.
keyFeatures: Full LMI with load chart compliance

name: Safe Load Indicator – Telescopic Crane
tagline: Capacity monitoring for telescopic boom cranes
overview: Our SLI for Telescopic Cranes covers mobile and truck-mounted cranes with telescopic booms. It provides real-time load, radius, boom length, and angle with overload and tip-over prevention.

safetyParameters.title: Boom Extension
safetyParameters.description: Sensing for multi-stage telescopic deployment.

safetyParameters.title: Load Chart Logic
safetyParameters.description: Dynamically updates capacity vs. boom length.

safetyParameters.title: Tip-Over Guard
safetyParameters.description: Stability calculation for outrigger deployment.

safetyParameters.title: A2B Alert
safetyParameters.description: Prevents block-to-boom physical contact errors.

workingPrinciple: Load, boom angle, and extended length are measured. The LMI uses the crane’s load chart to determine safe capacity for the current configuration. Warning and overload stages trigger alerts and hoist/boom lockout as required.

name: Safe Load Indicator – Pick & Carry Crane
overview: The SLI for Pick & Carry Cranes addresses the specific risks of loading while travelling. It monitors load, boom configuration, and stability to prevent overload and tip-over during both static lift and pick-and-carry.

safetyParameters.title: Dynamic Safety
safetyParameters.description: Adjusts for weight shifts during crane travel.

safetyParameters.title: Travel Limit
safetyParameters.description: Inhibits transmission if load exceeds safe limit.

safetyParameters.title: Boom Geometry
safetyParameters.description: Constant radius vs. capacity verification.

safetyParameters.title: Module Watchdog
safetyParameters.description: Ensures all safety interlocks are responsive.

workingPrinciple: Load and boom geometry are measured in real time. The system accounts for reduced capacity during pick-and-carry (dynamic vs. static) and applies appropriate limits. Alarms and interlocks prevent unsafe travel.
keyFeatures: Clear warning before travel with load
Rugged design for yard and site use

name: Safe Load Indicator – Forklift
tagline: Overload and tip-over protection for forklifts
overview: Our Forklift SLI monitors load on the forks and lift height to prevent overload and forward tip-over. It helps comply with safety norms and reduces product and equipment damage in warehouses and factories.

safetyParameters.title: Fork Overload
safetyParameters.description: Monitors vertical load against mast capacity.

safetyParameters.title: Forward Stability
safetyParameters.description: Prevents tip-over during high-reach loading.

safetyParameters.title: Height Safety
safetyParameters.description: Reduces speed/motion as lift height increases.

safetyParameters.title: Sensor Logic
safetyParameters.description: Detects hydraulic pressure or cell failure.

workingPrinciple: Load is measured via fork or mast-mounted load cell; height is measured via sensor. The system uses the truck’s load moment capacity to determine if the current load and height are safe. Alarms alert the operator when limits are approached or exceeded.

name: Safe Load Indicator – Tipper Truck
tagline: Payload monitoring for tippers and dump trucks
overview: The Tipper Truck SLI measures payload using load cells on the chassis or axle. It helps prevent overloading, ensures compliance with transport regulations, and optimises loading cycles at quarries, mines, and construction sites.

safetyParameters.title: Axle Loading
safetyParameters.description: Prevents road-legal limits from being exceeded.

safetyParameters.title: Chassis Level
safetyParameters.description: Monitors tilt during tipping to avoid roll-over.

safetyParameters.title: Load Variance
safetyParameters.description: Detects uneven load distribution on wheels.

safetyParameters.title: Speed Guard
safetyParameters.description: Optional alert if traveling with raised body.

workingPrinciple: Load cells measure the weight on the axle(s) or chassis. Tare is stored; when loaded, net payload is displayed. The system can trigger alerts when legal or site-specific limits are exceeded.
keyFeatures: Gross, tare, and net weight display
Rugged for mining and quarry use
Optional RFID, printer, or fleet link
